showInfo.description: Whether to display a progress value or status icon
showInfo.description_zh: 是否显示进度数值或状态图标

status.description: Status, optional: success exception normal active (line only)
status.description_zh: 状态，可选：success exception normal active(仅限 line)

strokeColor.description: The color of the progress bar

strokeLinecap.description: The style of the progress bar

trailColor.description: The color of the unfinished segment

type.description_zh: 类型，可选 line circle dashboard

:size.type: number / [number / string, number] / { width: number, height: number } / small / default
:size.description: The size of the progress bar

:steps.description: The total number of steps in the progress bar

:rounding.description_zh: 用于四舍五入数值的函数

:percentPosition.description: Position of percentage value, pass in object, 'align' represents horizontal position, 'type' represents whether inside or outside progress bar
:percentPosition.description_zh: 进度数值位置，传入对象，align 表示数值的水平位置，type 表示数值在进度条内部还是外部

:gapDegree.description: The notch angle of the dashboard progress bar, can be 0 ~ 295
:gapDegree.description_zh: 仪表盘进度条缺口角度，可取值 0 ~ 295

gapPosition.description: Notch position of the dashboard progress bar
gapPosition.description_zh: 仪表盘进度条缺口位置

:strokeWidth.description: The width of the progress bar line, in percentage of the width of the progress bar canvas
:strokeWidth.description_zh: 进度条线的宽度，单位是进度条画布宽度的百分比

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

LineProgress.name: steps
LineProgress.description: The total number of steps in the progress bar

LineProgress.name: rounding
LineProgress.description_zh: 用于四舍五入数值的函数

LineProgress.name: strokeColor
LineProgress.description: Color of progress bar, pass in object for gradient. Supports passing in an array when steps is present.
LineProgress.description_zh: 进度条的色彩，传入 object 时为渐变。当有 steps 时支持传入一个数组。
LineProgress.type: string | string[] | { from: string; to: string; direction: string }

CircleProgress.name: steps
CircleProgress.description: Total number of steps in the progress bar. When passing an object, count refers to the number of steps, and gap refers to the interval size. When passing number type, gap defaults to 2.
CircleProgress.description_zh: 进度条总共步数，传入 object 时，count 指步数，gap 指间隔大小。传 number 类型时，gap 默认为 2。

CircleProgress.name: strokeColor
CircleProgress.description: Color of circular progress bar, pass in object for gradient
CircleProgress.description_zh: 圆形进度条线的色彩，传入 object 时为渐变

CircleProgress.name: strokeWidth
CircleProgress.description: Width of circular progress bar, in percentage of canvas width
CircleProgress.description_zh: 圆形进度条线的宽度，单位是进度条画布宽度的百分比

DashboardProgress.name: steps
DashboardProgress.description: Total number of steps in the progress bar. When passing an object, count refers to the number of steps, and gap refers to the interval size. When passing number type, gap defaults to 2.
DashboardProgress.description_zh: 进度条总共步数，传入 object 时，count 指步数，gap 指间隔大小。传 number 类型时，gap 默认为 2。

DashboardProgress.name: gapDegree
DashboardProgress.description: The notch angle of the dashboard progress bar, can be 0 ~ 295
DashboardProgress.description_zh: 仪表盘进度条缺口角度，可取值 0 ~ 295

DashboardProgress.name: gapPosition
DashboardProgress.description: Notch position of the dashboard progress bar
DashboardProgress.description_zh: 仪表盘进度条缺口位置

DashboardProgress.name: strokeWidth
DashboardProgress.description: Width of dashboard progress bar, in percentage of canvas width
DashboardProgress.description_zh: 仪表盘进度条线的宽度，单位是进度条画布宽度的百分比
